comments.en:
J.C. Bradfield (jcb@dcs.ed.ac.uk) has written a fully functional driver which converts PPM files ("ppmtomd"). He started hacking ghostscript, but abandoned it.

The "md2k" driver is documented only in Japanese.

"md2k" is reported to work, but suffers from some banding and dithering problems.

Joel McLaughlin is very content with this printer and the "md2k" driver. Driver supports all features but metallic, white, or multicolour cartridges.
